sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { Modal, Button } from 'react-bootstrap'; const SingleCourse = ({ showModal , handleCloseModal , selectedCourse}) => { return (
Course Details

ID: {selectedCourse.id}

Name: {selectedCourse.name}

Description: {selectedCourse.description}

Category_id: {selectedCourse.category_id}

Status: {selectedCourse.status}

Teacher: {selectedCourse.teacher}

Video_link: {selectedCourse.video_link}
) } export default SingleCourse
